虸”。

蚄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fāng］
［《廣韻》府良切，平陽，非。］
见“虸蚄”。
[②]［bàng］
即蚌。

蚄字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚄； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1077第12
【唐韻】府良切【集韻】【韻會】分房切，?音方。虸蚄，蟲名，見虸字註。【韻會】通作方。【禮·樂記】方以類聚。【註】方謂行蟲有識性，故稱方。　又【字彙補】《論衡》云：月毀于天，螺蚄臽缺。疑卽蚌也。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚄; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1077 Page 12
【Tang Yun】Fuliang cut 【Ji Yun】【Yunhui】divided into different rooms,? Yin Fang.虸脄, insect name, see 虸字 Note. [Rhyme Club] is a general formula. 【Li·Le Ji】Fang to gather together. [Note] Fang said that worms are knowledgeable, so it is called Fang.　[Words complement] "Lun Heng" says: The moon is destroyed in the sky, and the snails are lacking. Suspected clam too.
